channel.title: Power Platform Licensing Service
channel.description: Overview of all Power Platform licenses.

item.title: Power Apps Developer Plan
item.description: Access and customise your own Dataverse environment. 200MB Database, 2GB file storage. Does not count to tenant's overall quota. Individual use only.

item.title: O365 and M365
item.description: Dataverse for Teams including 5 + 1 environment per 20 eligible licences, 2GB per environment.

item.title: O365 and M365
item.description: 2,000 API requests per user per 24-hour period.
